plot: In 1877 the Kingdom of Romania declares its independence from the Ottoman Empire.The Romanian forces join the Russian armies fighting against the Ottoman forces that are dug in a series of forts south of the Danube river.
title: Pentru patrie
plot_es: In 1877 the Kingdom of Romania declares its independence from the Ottoman Empire.The Romanian forces join the Russian armies fighting against the Ottoman forces that are dug in a series of forts south of the Danube river.
plot_en: In 1877 the Kingdom of Romania declares its independence from the Ottoman Empire.The Romanian forces join the Russian armies fighting against the Ottoman forces that are dug in a series of forts south of the Danube river.

cast.role: tarul Alexandru al II-lea al Rusiei
cast.name: Mircea Anghelescu
